settings.content_title: Enhance Gut Function and Immunity Naturally  Tackling digestive
settings.detail-text:
Tackling digestive imbalances and immune challenges starts with the gut. Our prebiotic supplement is the key,offering a natural approach to foster a healthy microbiome.


By feeding beneficial gut bacteria, it supports improved digestion, combats bloating, and promotes regular bowel movements, setting the foundation for a stronger immune defense and enhanced nutrient absorption.

settings.content_title: Elevate Your Well-being with Balanced Digestion
settings.detail-text:
Experience the difference with a well-nourished gut that leads to smoother digestion and an overall sense of wellness.

Our carefully formulated prebiotic not only ensures daily digestive comfort but also aids in managing appetite and supporting metabolic health, crucial for maintaining energy levels and a healthy weight.

settings.pro-desc: A premier soluble fiber derived from guar beans, Sunfiber promotes gut health not only by enhancing regularity but also by fostering the growth of beneficial gut bacteria, leading to improved nutrient absorption and a stronger barrier against gut inflammation.

A powerhouse for immune and digestive health, black elderberry extract is rich in immune-boosting antioxidants that also work to support the gut lining, potentially reducing gastrointestinal inflammation and enhancing the body's ability to fight off pathogens.

A natural, zero-calorie sweetener that supports gut health by providing a sweet taste without the negative effects of sugar, making it ideal for maintaining balanced blood sugar levels and a healthy gut environment.

settings.title: Clean, Safe, Powerful Ingredients.
settings.desc: Our unique blend combines scientifically-backed prebiotics and potent polyphenols that optimise gut health and immune function.

settings.title: Low FODMAP Certified
settings.content:
Our product proudly carries the Low-FODMAP Certified seal from Monash University, ensuring it's safe and beneficial for those with sensitive digestive systems.


This certification means our prebiotic blend has been rigorously tested and proven to be low in fermentable carbohydrates, which can trigger symptoms in individuals with IBS and similar conditions.


By choosing our Low-FODMAP Certified product, you're opting for a gut health solution designed to support without causing discomfort, making it an ideal choice for maintaining digestive wellness and comfort.

settings.img-desc: Gut Microbiome Imbalance: The standard modern diet, lacking in fiber and high in processed foods, disrupts our gut microbiome, leading to digestive issues and impacting overall health.

Dietary Fiber Deficiency: A significant decline in the consumption of fiber-rich fruits, vegetables, and whole grains has left many individuals without the necessary dietary fiber for healthy digestion and regularity.
Chronic Stress Impact: Elevated stress levels can have a detrimental effect on gut health, contributing to an array of digestive problems, including bloating and irregular bowel movements.
Immune System Support: Given that a large portion of the immune system resides in the gut, fostering a healthy gut environment with prebiotics is key to strong immune defense and overall wellness.

settings.title: Why You Need  Prebiotic Fibre for Optimal Gut Health
settings.sub-title: Understanding the Critical Need for Magnesium
settings.desc: In today's fast-paced world, maintaining a healthy gut is more crucial than ever. But why exactly do you need prebiotic fibre, and how does it support better gut health?
settings.lst-dsc: Embracing a prebiotic supplement can significantly aid in rebalancing your gut microbiome, enhancing nutrient absorption, and bolstering your immune system. Our scientifically formulated blend is tailored to address these modern challenges, offering a straightforward solution to improving your gut health and, by extension, your quality of life.

settings.title: What is SunfiberÂ® and how does it benefit my digestive health?
settings.content: SunfiberÂ® is a key ingredient in our Prebiotic Powder, a partially hydrolyzed guar gum that's organic and low-FODMAP. It's known for promoting regular bowel movements and consistency, making it gentle on your digestive system and effective in supporting gut health.

settings.title: Is this product suitable for people with specific dietary restrictions?
settings.content: Yes, our Prebiotic Powder is designed with dietary sensitivities in mind. It's low-FODMAP, making it suitable for individuals with such dietary needs. The formula is also organic, ensuring high-quality, natural ingredients.

settings.title: How do I incorporate this prebiotic powder into my daily routine?
settings.content: Simply mix one scoop of the Prebiotic Powder in a glass of water once daily. The powder is easy to mix and has a pleasant Black Elderberry flavour, making it a convenient and enjoyable addition to your daily health regimen.

settings.title: Can this prebiotic powder help with immune support?
settings.content: Absolutely. The combination of SunfiberÂ® and Black Elderberry extract in our Prebiotic Powder not only supports digestive health but also contributes to immune support. A healthy gut is key to a strong immune system, and our formula is designed to support this connection.

settings.title: Is the Prebiotic Powder sweetened, and if so what kind of sweetener is used?
settings.content: Yes, our Prebiotic Powder is sweetened, but we use Monk Fruit Extract, a natural, low-calorie sweetener. It's an excellent choice for those looking to avoid artificial sweeteners or excess calories, and its low-FODMAP nature makes it suitable for individuals with sensitive digestive systems.

settings.title: When should I take this prebiotic?
settings.content: You can take this product any time of the day.

settings.title: Can I take this prebiotic every day?
settings.content: Yes you can. Itâs designed to be taken daily to increase and optimise your healthy fibre intake.
